mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, NAME, GENDER, AGE, PHONE_NUMBER, CAR_NUMBER) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_ID.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phoneNumber}, #{carNumber})
INSERT INTO AUTH (MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{loginId}, #{password})

SELECT SEQ_CART_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CART (CART_ID, MEMBER_ID, CART_URI) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{memberId}, 'scanandgo://deeplink?cartId=' || #{cartId})
mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.LOGIN_ID, A.PASSWORD, A.ROLE FROM AUTH A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE A.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId} AND M.IS_DELETED = 0
SELECT A.LOGIN_ID, M.NAME, M.GENDER, M.AGE, M.PHONE_NUMBER, M.CAR_NUMBER FROM AUTH A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT P.PAYMENT_ID, P.CREATED_AT, P.AMOUNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN CART C ON M.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID JOIN PAYMENT P ON C.CART_ID = P.CART_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY P.PAYMENT_ID DESC

SELECT PI.PAYMENT_ITEM_ID, PI.NAME, PI.PRICE, PI.QUANTITY, PI.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE FROM PAYMENT P JOIN PAYMENT_ITEM PI ON PI.PAYMENT_ID = P.PAYMENT_ID WHERE P.PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId} ORDER BY PI.PAYMENT_ITEM_ID DESC
